description:
The fun continues with almost all of the members playing a game of "Yuriwolf". The focus narrows down to two members suspected of being a Yuriwolf, even as the number of man-loving members decreases. Is one of the two suspects lying? Or maybe...? The bond between members is deepend through this collaboration, but can they safely root out the Yuriwolf and bring peace back to the dorm? Don`t miss the shocking conclusion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Werewolves and Yuri 2
